ygData.subject: Re: RESEARCH
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not a problem.  If there s a page 8 and a page 9, there will be no page 7 or page 10.  Confirmed by GZ. E -- Maybe I was mean but I really don t think so
ygData.messageBody:
mark Prescott wrote:
> > 2> Velishoul's Pages are full pages and sequential, thus you combine page
> 8
> > and 9 to make a spell, etc.
> so if you combine 7 and 8 it makes a spell...would 8-9 work also or is
> using the right pair important?
> because there are two pairs for each page

Not a problem. If there's a page 8 and a page 9, there will be no page
7 or page 10. Confirmed by GZ.

E
--
"Maybe I was mean
but I really don't think so
You asked if I'm scared and I
said so"

-Sinead O'Connor, "The Emperor's New Clothes"
